values: BOWIEMAS! David Bowie Tribute Night at Bar Le Ritz

BOWIEMAS! David Bowie Tribute Night/Dance Party at Bar Le Ritz Advance tickets at https://buytickets.at/12xuproductions/1086171 + Tickets $15-20 on the door It's that time of the year to celebrate the holidays AND the life of Ziggy Stardust, The Picasso of Pop, The Dame, The Master of Reinvention, The Chameleon of Rock, Aladdin Sane, Major Tom, Starman a.k.a DAVID BOWIE- quite close to his bday as well!!! Dress in your finest ugly xmas sweaters, green, red, and silver razzle dazzle. Try on some Bowie-esque face paint, suits, catsuits or Goblin King replica outfits and come dance with Bowie loving DJs as they spin tunes from his glam majesty's repertoire that will get you dancing and spinning late into the Bowie music filled night! There is no dress code, but dressing up is always fun! Friday, December 15th 2023 Bar Le Ritz PBD 179 Rue Jean-Talon O, Montr√©al, QC H2R 2X2 11pm until 3am, 18+ Presented by 12XU Events, the people behind The Dark Eighties, Synthhaus, Avant Garde Disko, and more!

Come celebrate with us for the last supernature of 2023! FREE - At Bar Waverly - 10pm @ 3am. Not only a dance party, we host performances by queer artists and we welcome a waacking battle, a dance born in the 70s in queer Black/Latino Clubs of the east coast. We believe partying should be accessible to everybody. For that reason, Supernature is a free event, tips are very appreciated by the performers. Arder X Truncate [50 Weapons, Blueprint Records, Figure]

Arder is back with part 2 of our warehouse series at ESC. For the occasion we have the pleasure of inviting one of the most influential names in the techno world. His productions have no doubt shaped the sound of recent techno. Formally known as Audio Injection, Truncate focuses on the deeper, raw side of techno. His Truncate releases have gained critical acclaim from world class underground talent such as Modeselektor, Ben Klock, Marcel Dettmann, Chris Liebing, Speedy J, DVS1, Luke Slater, Ben Sims, Josh Wink, Eats Everything, Joris Voorn, and many more.

Groove Theory @ Le Salon Daom√© - Dec 15th, 2023

Welcome to Groove Theory. GT is a series of events that celebrates the art of house and minimal music. Hosted by Brian Cuta, each edition invites a different artist to showcase their unique sound. These artists will intricately dissect their creative system and express themselves through rhythms, beats, and melodies that will make both experienced and casual dancers move to the groove. Come down to Le Salon Daom√© on Friday, December 15th for the very first edition. Groove instructors: Brian Cuta SC: https://soundcloud.com/briancuta IG: @brian.cuta Oli Vez SC: https://soundcloud.com/olivez IG: @olivez.musique The Groove Theory is in session üéµ

Markus Floats *Album Release Show* ft. KY & Liliane Chlela

Montr√©al-based composer and multimedia artist Markus Floats has announced a launch show for his latest full length 'Fourth Album', released by Constellation last October. The release event will take place on December 17th at La Sala Rossa. Markus will be joined on stage by his Egyptian Cotton Arkestra bandmates Ari Swan on violin, James Goddard on saxophone and electronics, and Lucas Huang on guitar and drums. https://markusfloats.bandcamp.com Also on the bill that evening: Ky (Femmaggots, Nag, Lungbutter) whose debut solo record 'Power Is The Pharmacy' was released by Constellation earlier this year. Ky will be joined on stage by Amy MacDonald (guitar) Mat Ball (guitar), Rob Grieve (7-string guitar), James Goddard (sax and electronics), and Farley Miller (drums). https://ky-mtl.bandcamp.com Rounding up this terrific line-up is Lebanese-born, Montr√©al-based electronic producer Liliane Chlela, whose latest album 'Safala' was released on vinyl by Asadun Alay Records, producer and sound engineer Radwan Ghazi Moumneh's new venture. https://lilianechlela.bandcamp.com Tickets are $17 advance / $20 door Doors @7pm - Show @8pm

üéâ Celebrating 30 Years of Dance Excellence at San Tropez Dance School! üéâ I am thrilled to invite you all to join us at the grand celebration of our 30th-anniversary gala, The Alignment. We couldn't be prouder to share this momentous occasion with each and every one of you. For three decades, San Tropez Dance School has been a haven for creativity, passion, and growth in the world of dance. Our school's journey has been filled with countless inspiring stories of success and perseverance. The Alignment isn't just a show; it's a testament to the amazing talent that has emerged from our very own studio. Many of the brilliant artists you see today, who have achieved remarkable success in their careers, began their dance journeys right here with us. üéüÔ∏è Tickets Now on Sale! üéüÔ∏è Don't miss this unforgettable evening filled with mesmerizing performances that draw inspiration from the chakra system. Through breathtaking choreography and heart-stirring music, The Alignment will take you on a soulful journey through the seven energy centers that guide us all. üóìÔ∏è Date: Saturday, December 16th, 2023 üéüÔ∏è Tickets: All-Star Ticket: Dinner + Show + Social (Details at latindance.net) Star Ticket: Appetizers + Show + Social General Admission: Show + Social Experience a burst of flavors with our dinner menu : ‚û°Ô∏èCrisp Mediterranean Salad or Leek and Potato Soup ‚û°Ô∏èSavor the choice between Chicken Cacciatore or Beef Stroganoff. ‚û°Ô∏èEnd on a sweet note with the luscious Pastel de Tres Leches dessert. Dive into captivating performances influenced by the chakra system, and enjoy social dancing with DJ Sabrusso until 3 am ! üèõÔ∏è Venue: Theatre Plaza So mark your calendars, gather your friends and family, and book your tickets now! This is an event you won't want to miss. Let's come together to celebrate the magic of dance and the power of artistic expression that has made San Tropez Dance School a beacon of creativity in our community. To purchase your tickets, visit - latindance.net or call 514-871-8852. Seating is limited, so secure your spot early! Join us in reminiscing about the past 30 years while embracing the exciting future that lies ahead for San Tropez Dance School. Together, let's raise the curtain on The Alignment and dance our way into a brighter and more inspiring tomorrow. See you there! üï∫üíÉ With gratitude and excitement, Sonia Kyriacou Founder & Artistic Director, San Tropez Dance School

Friday Night Live with Sheli Stevens

Friday Night Live with Sheli Stevens Friday, December 15th, 7:00 p.m. ‚Äì 9:00 p.m. 1844 Rue William, Montr√©al, QC H3J 1R5, Canada Join us for an evening of captivating vocals and dynamic stage presence. Sheli, a locally renowned singer and founder of Stage Craft, will add elegance to the repertoire. About the event: Step into the enchanting world of live music at Griffintown Piano and Art Bar, a cozy and atmospheric space where every note comes alive. Join us this Friday night for an extraordinary musical journey featuring the incomparable Sheli Stevens! Immerse yourself in the soulful melodies and dynamic stage presence that have made Sheli a standout in the music world. In the intimate setting of Griffintown Piano and Art Bar, you'll experience not just a performance, but a connection with the music and fellow enthusiasts. Sheli Stevens, renowned for her captivating vocals, will add a touch of elegance to the night's repertoire. Don't miss this chance to enjoy live music in a space designed for connection and conversation. Join us for an evening that transcends the ordinary, filled with enchanting tunes and the magic of Sheli Stevens.
Montreal Art Centre ¬∑ Montreal, Quebec, Canada

A spectacular holiday tradition ‚Äî Winter Lights! When darkness falls on winter evenings from Thanksgiving through early January, Shelburne Museum‚Äôs campus glows in a bedazzling display of lights and music. A holiday extravaganza, Winter Lights delights visitors of all ages with imaginatively and wondrously decorated iconic structures and gardens throughout the campus. The 220-foot steamboat Ticonderoga and its companion 1871 Lighthouse as well as the magical Beach Woods and beautiful Bostwick Garden are a few of the 18 special installations that are festooned with thousands of lights that make for a breathtaking walking tour of the Museum campus. New offerings include lighting the Locomotive 220 and Grand Isle Rail Car at the Train Station, and Wednesday evening drive-through tours. Tickets: Adults: $15 Children (ages 3-17): $10 Children (ages 0-2): Free Wednesday Evening Drive Through: $65 per car. To get tickets, and for more information, visit https://shelburnemuseum.org/visit/winter-lights/ Shelburne Museum thanks our sponsors for their generous support! Partnering sponsors: Lake Champlain Chocolates and Radiance Medical Aesthetics and Wellness Spa With additional support from: Global Foundries and Vermont Mutual Insurance Group
